json.text: Wholesale Vape Shop From China

E-Cigarettes and vaping will help you quit
smoking today.

Take your first step towards a cigarette-free
lifestyle by buying a healthier alternative

from the range of electronic cigarettes, mods
and vapes on offer at the Chinavasion vape
shop.

E-cigarettes or e cigs for short are a handheld
gadget that vaporizes eliquid that can be

inhaled by the user, the fluid in these vapor
cigarettes will often contain nicotine and

comes in a variety of flavors
E-Cigarette Terminology

Coil - This refers to the wire coil that is
heated and used to vaporize the e-liquid / ejuice.

Ejuice/Eliquid - The liquid that is vaporized
when using an e-cig.

ENDS/ENNDS - electronic nicotine delivery
systems (ENDS), electronic non-nicotine delivery
systems (ENNDS).

Cloud-chasers: These are vapers who want to
produce large clouds when vaping.

Cloud-chasers will often use powerful box
mods with higher wattages and sub-ohm coils.

Mod - The main part of a vaporizer including
the battery and usually heating element controls.
Ohm - This is a measure of electrical resistance.

Pen/Vape Pen- A style of e-cig that has the
appearance of a ball point pen.

Starter Kit - This is a complete kit that
typically includes everything needed to start
vaping besides the ejuice.

Sub-Ohm - Coils or atomizers listed as sub-ohm
will work at under 1 ohm.

The lower resistance and faster heating involved
will allow more ejuice to be vaporized in
a shorter amount of time.

Tank - A vape tank is where the ejuice is
stored and is generally part of the atomizer
unit.

Kanger, Eleaf, Smok, Wismec, and Rofvape are
all Chinese companies brands making e-cigarettes

Vaping Development
E-cigarette and vaping equipment have grown

into a huge market since they were first introduced
in 2004.
As of 2014, it was worth over $7 billion globally.

There are slim, pen-like designs that are
discreet and easy to carry as well as bulkier

more rugged looking devices that can last
longer and produce more vapor in one go.

The high innovation in this market has also
added to some vape starter kits being highly

customizable with many companies offering
interchangeable mouthpieces, tanks, mods,

atomizers, coils, and batteries so as hip
consumers can customize and make their own

and specific vaporizer that is tailored to
their needs.

Vape Shop
A number of specialist vape shops have opened

up in recent years however, E cigarettes are
still mainly available online at vape stores.

These online stores have a few advantages
over the brick and mortar vape shop and small

resellers, mainly their ability to offer a
wider range and at usually much better value
and wholesale prices.

There is no doubt that e-cigs and vaping are
healthier than cigarettes, this is because

the users consume eliquid which is much healthier
than tobacco.

Studies have shown that cigarette smoke contains
over 4000 chemicals including many carcinogens
and other cancer-causing compounds.

Eliquid, on the other hand, is fairly simple
and includes either propylene glycol or vegetable

glycerin, flavoring and in some cases nicotine
as well.

Additionally, vaporizers operate at a much
lower temperature and the vapor produced from

these e-cigs doesn't contain the tar associated
with tobacco.

Electronic Cigarette History
The modern e-cigarette design of 2003 can

be credited to a Chinese pharmacist and inventor
known as Hon Lik, and today China is still
at the forefront of this technology.

Since then electronic cigarette and vaporizers
have come a long way and now there are hundreds
of manufacturers across the world.

However, China still remains at the forefront
of this technology.
You can choose your favorite at Chinavasion.com
